Business AI Labâ€™s team NEU-LINH won first place in the Northern Regional Round of the 2025 AI Olympic. The team, consisting of three members from the Lab, showcased sharp analytical thinking and strong strategic execution to surpass many tough competitors. Other Lab teams, NEU-BAIL and NEU-TURNING, also earned recognition, reflecting the Labâ€™s solid academic foundation and effective mentorship.
